amendment.description: To authorize $5,500,000 for military construction for the Army for the construction of a rotary wing landing pad at Fort Wainwright, Alaska, and to provide an offset of $8,000,000 by canceling a military construction project for the construction of an F-15E flight simulator facility at Elmendorf Air Force Base, Alaska.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1396 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1396 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S8651-8653; text: CR S8652) To authorize $5,500,000 for military construction for the Army for the construction of a rotary wing landing pad at Fort Wainwright, Alaska, and to provide an offset of $8,000,000 by canceling a military construction project for the construction of an F-15E flight simulator facility at Elmendorf Air Force Base, Alaska.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1396 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1396 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
